abstract: Subjects include a Bowery hotel that houses two different worlds; a legendary comedian who panhandles in Midtown; and a cleanup of Zuccotti Park, home of Occupy Wall Street.
snippet: Subjects include a Bowery hotel that houses two different worlds; a legendary comedian who panhandles in Midtown; and a cleanup of Zuccotti Park, home of Occupy Wall Street.

headline.main: The Week in Pictures for Oct. 14
